description: Try our easy to follow Italian Crepes With Roasted Pumpkin And Ricotta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Italian Crepes With Roasted Pumpkin And Ricotta
name: Italian Crepes With Roasted Pumpkin And Ricotta Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide the pumpkin mixture into eight pieces and form each into a log. Wrap with a crepe, slice into three piece, then arrange these on a lined oven tray. Bake for 10-12 minutes, until warmed through, then serve with the remaining olive oil, sage, pine nuts, parmesan and lemon.
